title: Science Instructional Design Course Utilizing Program-Based Response Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and basic understanding of educational program design
context.additional_context: Mobile-based microlearning for in-service professionals to acquire program instructional design competencies in the science domain

learning_goals: Learners can complete five science instructional design frameworks by applying program-based response learning principles.
Learners can perform response tasks for program frames with over 90% accuracy in mobile environments.
Learners achieve over 85% compliance with program rules during instructional design, enabling them to develop new educational program elements.

resources: Program-based response learning content authoring tool

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
